titles.title: A resolution to limit legislative amendments to general appropriations bills.

action.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Over, Under the Rule.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends rule XVI of the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide that if a point of order is made against an amendment to a general appropriations bill on certain grounds, then it shall not be in order to raise the defense of germaneness unless there is House legislative language on that subject contained in the bill.
